sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Chart from 'chart.js'; import './Summary.css'; const beans = ["", "Raw Material", "Roasted Beans", "Winnowed Beans", "Ground Beans", "Chocolate Bars", "Cocoa Powder"]; var ctx = document.getElementById('Chart'); var myChart = new Chart(ctx, { type: 'bar', data: { labels: ['一月', '二月', '三月'], datasets: [{ backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)' ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255,99,132,1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)' ], borderWidth: 1, label: '銷售業績(百萬)', data: [60, 49, 72] }] } }); class Summary extends Component { render() { return (
Summary
{beans.map(name => )}
{name}
Fermented Beans 0 0 0 0 0 0
Unfermented Beans 0 0 0 0 0 0
Total 0 0 0 0 0 0
) } } export default Summary;
